/*[AdminPrMgmt_SQL.xml].[getNewsInfo] */
SELECT news_seq, news_title, news_description, A.visible, A.creator, A.create_time, A.updater, A.update_time, B.image_file_id as imageFileId, C.FILE_NAME as fileName, C.FILE_PATH as filePath FROM app_board_news_test A left OUTER JOIN (select * from app_image_file_info_test where board_type_cd = 'brdt002' AND visible = 'Y') B ON A.news_seq = B.board_seq left outer join J_ATTACHFILE_TEST C on B.image_file_id = C.file_id WHERE news_seq = #{newsSeq}

/*[AdminPrMgmt_SQL.xml].[selectNewsListCnt] */
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM app_board_news_test where visible != 'D'
AND news_title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND news_description LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
